definition: tank used for collecting and storing a liquid (as water or oil)
details:
noun
- tank used for collecting and storing a liquid (as water or oil)
- lake used to store water for community use
= synonyms: artificial lake, man-made lake
- anything (a person or animal or plant or substance) in which an infectious agent normally lives and multiplies
= example: anything (a person or animal or plant or substance) in which an infectious agent normally lives and multiplies
= synonyms: source
- a large or extra supply of something
= example: a large or extra supply of something
